It's welcome to contact author if you need customized software
Show icon of application from Launcher
Icon of application will disappear from Launcher while turning this off, but you can open this application from the module category of Xposed Installer.
\u26a0\ufe0fFaulty Status with Xposed\u26a0\ufe0f\nAny settings will be invalid.

It'll be faster to force stop application and wipe user data by using Root access directly. However, because of different ways to gain Root access of devices, your device may get Root incompletely. You'll have problems with this feature on if rooting flawed.\n\nAre you sure to use Root access？

【Characteristics of Using Internal Space as Storage】
Support to intercept applications without authority of SD Memory Card
Incompatible with versions of system above 7.0

【Characteristics of Using External Space as Storage】
nUnsupport to intercept applications without authority of SD Memory Card
Edit configuration files directly at ease
Compatible with all versions of system

Sure to use internal space as storage？

In order to use normally, AppEnv needs reading permission of SD Memory Card.

Ｑ：Why it needs that permission？
Ａ：For the security of operating system, a permission called 【MODE_WORLD_READABLE】 has been resigned in Android above 7.0. This permission was used to make other processes visit any files that it set, which is also an entrance of configuration to intercept application that AppEnv offered. Because the permission is removed from system, plus I'm a newbie, I grudgingly put configuration files on SD Memory Card so that I let other application to read.

Ｑ：What will happen if I don't give authority？
Ａ：You can set on 「Use internal space as storage」 in configuration if your system is former than 7.0, then you can use this application normally. On the contrary, I think you couldn't use this normally if version of your operating stsyem is above 7.0 because configuration files can't be saved into internal space.

Ｑ：But I REALLY hate this permission
Ａ：I answer as author here, this application WON'T add any types of advertisement FOREVER, also, it WON'T generate any messy files in your storage. But there's an exception, statistics we used called 【友盟】, it seems like that it will generate a folder called 【umeng】 of your storage.

Ｑ：……
Ａ：…………

There's a benefit of saving configuration files to /data/local/tmp, compatible with all versions of system and all software. However, there is another flaw in this option, which requires Root access to run commands in normal. If you have Root access of your operating system, you can fully switch this on.
